languages.text: "Спасибо". {n}Одно короткое слово наполнено искренней благодарностью.{/n} "Еще я хотел вам кое-что предложить".
"Thank you." {n}His expression of gratitude is curt yet sincere.{/n} "I also have a suggestion to make."
languages.original_text: "Спасибо". {n}Одно короткое слово наполнено искренней благодарностью.{/n} "Еще я хотел вам кое-что предложить".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you." {n}His expression of gratitude is curt yet sincere.{/n} "I also have a suggestion to make."

"Thank you." {n}His expression of gratitude is curt yet sincere.{/n} "I also have a suggestion to make."

languages.text: "Danke." {n}Sein Ausdruck von Dankbarkeit ist kurz aber aufrichtig.{/n} "Außerdem möchte ich Euch einen Vorschlag machen."
languages.original_text: "Thank you." {n}His expression of gratitude is curt yet sincere.{/n} "I also have a suggestion to make."

traits.locale_text: "Danke." {n}Sein Ausdruck von Dankbarkeit ist kurz aber aufrichtig.{/n} "Außerdem möchte ich Euch einen Vorschlag machen."

languages.text: « Merci. » {n}Bien que l'expression de sa gratitude soit brève, elle ne manque pas de sincérité.{/n} « J'ai aussi quelque chose à vous suggérer. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you." {n}His expression of gratitude is curt yet sincere.{/n} "I also have a suggestion to make."

traits.locale_text: « Merci. » {n}Bien que l'expression de sa gratitude soit brève, elle ne manque pas de sincérité.{/n} « J'ai aussi quelque chose à vous suggérer. »

languages.text: “谢谢你。”{n}他的感谢简短而真诚。{/n}“另外，我还有个提议。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you." {n}His expression of gratitude is curt yet sincere.{/n} "I also have a suggestion to make."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你。”{n}他的感谢简短而真诚。{/n}“另外，我还有个提议。”

languages.text: «Gracias». {n}Expresa su agradecimiento de forma breve pero sincera.{/n} «Además, tengo una sugerencia para usted».
languages.original_text: "Thank you." {n}His expression of gratitude is curt yet sincere.{/n} "I also have a suggestion to make."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias». {n}Expresa su agradecimiento de forma breve pero sincera.{/n} «Además, tengo una sugerencia para usted».

languages.text: 「感謝する」{n}彼の感謝の表情は、素っ気ないながらも誠実である。{/n}「私も提案があります」
languages.original_text: "Thank you." {n}His expression of gratitude is curt yet sincere.{/n} "I also have a suggestion to make."

traits.locale_text: 「感謝する」{n}彼の感謝の表情は、素っ気ないながらも誠実である。{/n}「私も提案があります」

languages.text: "Teşekkür ederim." {n}Minnettarlığını kısa ancak samimi bir şekilde gösteriyor.{/n} "Ayrıca bir teklifim daha var."
languages.original_text: "Thank you." {n}His expression of gratitude is curt yet sincere.{/n} "I also have a suggestion to make."

traits.locale_text: "Teşekkür ederim." {n}Minnettarlığı kısa lakin samimidir.{/n} "Ayrıca bir teklifim daha var."
